duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the client development team to achieve business and growth objectives through new client acquisition and account management.
Drive new business activity and manage the business development team to exceed weekly quotas.
Support lead generating efforts to maintain a robust growth pipeline.
Develop and execute effective strategies to engage potential clients and close new business.
Identify and convert high-value opportunities into new business and implement strategies to realize them.
Maintain a robust sales pipeline and effectively manage sales opportunities through the entire sales cycle.
Collaborate with leadership team on organizational strategy, bringing new ideas and best practices.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Sales, or a related field (Master's preferred)
